summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of WM-Balia luxury landing page. All major features working correctly including hero section, navigation, products grid with lightbox, configurator iframe, contact form, and mobile responsiveness.

ui_bugs.issue: Element not stable during click action - timeout after 30s
ui_bugs.impact: Minor - scroll indicator has stability issues but functionality works

passed_tests: Hero section loads with CTA buttons and stats (3 stat items)
Navigation menu works with smooth scroll to sections (5 nav links)
Products grid displays 4 product cards correctly
Product card click opens lightbox modal successfully
Configurator iframe loads correctly from wm-kalkulator.pl
Contact form displays all fields (name, email, phone, message)
Contact form submit shows success message (visual only)
Footer with navigation links and social icons
Mobile menu toggle works on small screens
Mobile responsiveness works across all sections
All CTA buttons navigate to correct sections
Phone and email links work properly
